General.Name: Euro Sun Mining Inc
General.Description: Euro Sun Mining Inc. operates as a gold and copper exploration and development mining company in Romania. It primarily holds a 100% interest in the Rovina Valley project that covers an area of 27.68 square kilometers situated in west-central Romania. The company was formerly known as Carpathian Gold Inc. and changed its name to Euro Sun Mining Inc. in August 2016. Euro Sun Mining Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: TD Bank Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1E6
